scripts.migrate: docker-compose exec backend npm run migrate
scripts.seed: docker-compose exec backend npm run seed
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:ci: docker-compose exec -T backend npm run test && docker-compose exec -T frontend npm run test
scripts.test:setup: docker-compose exec db psql -U ohjaajarek -c 'CREATE DATABASE test' && docker-compose exec backend npm run migrate-test
scripts.test:backend: docker-compose exec backend npm run test
scripts.test:frontend: docker-compose exec frontend npm run test
